items.title: Nvidia is officially the world’s first $5 trillion company. CEO Jensen Huang says it’s on track for ‘half a trillion dollars’ in revenue
items.description: Nvidia reached the $5 trillion threshold just three months after becoming the first company to hit $4 trillion.

items.title: HKEX CEO Bonnie Chan says global stock exchanges have to work together to stay relevant in a crypto age
items.description: "We're entering a stage where exchanges are not really competing with one another, but working together," HKEX CEO Bonnie Chan said.

items.title: Chanel’s CEO went to Microsoft HQ and asked ChatGPT to show her a picture of her company’s leadership. They were all men in suits
items.description: Leena Nair said more than 75% of her company’s employees are female.

items.title: AI doesn’t fail on tech—it fails on leadership
items.description: Moving beyond the AI hype cycle toward the autonomous enterprise starts with intentional leadership.

items.title: UPS CFO on Amazon pullback and driving a growth strategy
items.description: Brian Dykes explains why UPS is prioritizing profitability over volume, and how refocusing its network is delivering results.
